    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_93586</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy needs of people from different climates</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energienotwendigkeiten der Leute von den 
unterschiedlichen Klimata</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Besoins énergétiques des personnes de 
différents climats</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Necessidades de energia dos povos dos climas 
diferentes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bisogni di energia della gente dai climi 
differenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενεργειακές ανάγκες των ανθρώπων από τα διαφορετικά 
κλίματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Necesidades energéticas de la gente de diversos 
climas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This map shows that people living in colder climates need more energy than do people from warmer climates.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">climate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cold climate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy consumption</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">warm climate</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Karte zeigt daß die Leute, die in der 
kälteren Klimanotwendigkeit mehr Energie leben, als von den wärmeren
Klimata bevölkeren Sie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette carte prouve que les gens vivant dans le 
besoin plus froid de climats plus d'énergie que peuplez des climats 
plus chauds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este mapa mostra que os povos que vivem em uma 
necessidade mais fria dos climas mais energia do que povoe de uns 
climas mais mornos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo programma indica che la gente che vive nel 
bisogno più freddo di climi più energia che popoli dai climi più 
caldi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο χάρτης δείχνει ότι οι άνθρωποι που ζουν στα 
πιό κρύα κλίματα χρειάζονται περισσότερη ενέργεια από άνθρωποι
από τα θερμότερα κλίματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta correspondencia muestra que gente que vive 
en una necesidad más fría de los climas más energía que pueble de 
climas más calientes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klima</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kaltes Klima</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energieverbrauch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">warmes Klima</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">climat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">climat froid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">consommation d'énergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">climat chaud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">clima</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">clima frio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">consumo de energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">clima caldo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
